output_list.criticism: The balance_wirthdraw function is owned by the owner, and can only be accessed by him/her. Thus, the owner can retrieve all the funds allocated for the crowdsale.

The balances_available_for_crowdsale function returns the balance of the crowdsale as a 256-bit integer. Since the balance may be larger than the maximum value of a 256-bit integer, an overflow occurs, causing the function to return 0 instead of the actual balance.
